https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ePRRs2KI8Mn394N4341DrHV5I0W.jpg A lawyer, who represents the German government against the Greek reparation claims for Nazi crimes in World War II, travels to Greece and meets one of the remaining survivors of the Kalavryta massacre that took place in 1943. Echoes of the Past
